title: Question About Bans
body:
Is there any possible to way to get a permanently banned account . un-banned? please aswear my question when seen . because last time it was deleted so i would just like to ask what i asked above..

Thanks for your time dear Rioter.

replies.body: Our Player Behavior team will look at each player's case individually, so we'll consider the situation.  We don't usually remove suspensions but we're always willing to hear it out.  For example, if the ban was erroneous.  The best way to find out would be to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to them, and request their review and consideration.   We want to keep the community fair and safe, hope you understand!
